page.title: 01Our Survey Block
page.content: Our survey block incorporates the villages of{Stow Maries, Purleigh, {Woodham Ferrers, Cold Norton}and the new town of{South Woodham Ferrers. Much of the land is covered by farm properties which have been there for many years. These farms are still farmed by the owners and before that by their fathers and even their grandfathers. This part of the country has seen little change. { Stow Maries}is a small village, with no shop and very few houses. The populated area lies either side of the main road from{South Woodham Ferrers to{Maldon}or{Burnham-on-Crouch. In great contrast the south of our area comprises many new closely built properties and a factory estate. It is the outer extremities of the new town{South Woodham Ferrers.
